  </script>
  <script src="https://cdn.optimizely.com/js/8271132298.js">
  </script>
 </head>

      </h1>

       </p>

     <section class="preview__main-container" id="preview">

       <div class="preview__text-wrapper">
        <h1 class="preview__title">
         WHY BUSUU?
        </h1>
        <ol class="preview__reasons">
         <li class="preview__reason js-item-rotator__text preview__reason--active js-item-rotator__text--active">
          Create a Study Plan to stay on track
         </li>
         <li class="preview__reason js-item-rotator__text">
          Remember all the vocabulary and grammar you need
         </li>
         <li class="preview__reason js-item-rotator__text">
          Immerse yourself from afar by learning with our community
         </li>
        </ol>
       </div>

           <path d="M49.195 31.983c.125.562-.273 1.06-.85 1.14-.545.075-1.042-.329-1.168-.86l-.502-2.477c-4.118-1.891-6.523-5.008-8.63-7.583a21.669 21.669 0 01-2.262-3.851c-.17-.324-.322-.604-.45-.836-.188-.338.053-.739.436-.688a11.53 11.53 0 014.71 1.756 15.813 15.813 0 016.775 8.374c.022-.003.041-.007.062-.009-.404-4.557.103-8.208.98-11.157 1.037-3.083 2.098-5.102 2.39-5.632.05-.093.137-.13.195-.042.807 1.216 4.484 13.1-2.158 19.47l.472 2.395zM36.777 75.205c-.863.893-2.46 2.51-2.549 2.397-.462.338-1.108.279-1.433-.151-.323-.433-.262-1.052.17-1.36.093.09 1.692-1.52 2.5-2.344-1.711-9.675-.136-17.047.102-19.206.021-.192.361-.393.522-.285 1.027.684 3.284 2.454 4.069 5.21 1.191 3.204 1.286 8.806-2.893 13.73.02.02.043.032.061.052.033.03.045.072.071.105 4.683-4.445 8.583-7.579 12.142-9.948 3.279-2.004 5.674-3.177 6.55-3.595.214-.102.383-.016.324.213-.315 1.212-1.828 5.076-4.9 8.898-3.425 4.233-9.167 7.405-14.736 6.284z" fill="#D6DEE6">

   </div>
   <div class="page-row animate-fade-in">
    <div class="page-wrap">
     <section class="b2b__wrap">
      <h2 class="b2b__title">
       Thinking about language learning for your business?
      </h2>
      <h3 class="b2b__subtitle">
       <a href="https://business.busuu.com">
        Find out how we are helping these great companies
       </a>
      </h3>
      <div class="g-row logo-collection__wrap">
       <div class="g-gutter logo-collection__item g-col2">
        <div class="fluid-content">
         <figure class="fluid-content__wrap fluid-content--4-3">

               </use>
              </mask>
              <path d="M5.45 3.28c0-1.392-.685-1.764-1.512-1.764-.924 0-1.439.672-1.439 1.703 0 1.067.552 1.86 1.535 1.86.731 0 1.415-.42 1.415-1.8M3.686 7.704c.936 0 1.727-.395 1.727-1.487v-.359c0-.144.024-.324.024-.324h-.024c-.36.54-.887.827-1.703.827-1.75 0-2.746-1.415-2.746-3.094 0-1.679.947-3.047 2.71-3.047C5.006.22 5.485 1 5.485 1h.036s-.01-.072-.01-.168V.364h1.425V6.11C6.936 8.208 5.306 9 3.71 9a4.876 4.876 0 01-2.17-.528l.455-1.163s.768.395 1.691.395" mask="url(#icon_blog-b)">
              </path>
             </g>
            </g>
           </svg>
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </footer>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
